item.title: By: Phillip
item.dc:creator: Phillip
item.description: <p>Congratulations Matt! That's fantastic news, and well deserved. Enjoy the rest of Lotusphere.</p>
item.content:encoded: Congratulations Matt! That’s fantastic news, and well deserved. Enjoy the rest of Lotusphere.

item.title: By: Mum

item.description: <p> <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif"</a> /> Not sure of the implications but congrats from both of us! Glad first presentation went well - public speaking may well be in the blood after all!</p>
